solution_line_template: His total without the coupons was ${paid_amount} - ${change_received} = $<<{paid_amount}-{change_received}={total_without_coupons}>>{total_without_coupons}
He had {num_coupons} coupons that each saved him 25 cents, so the full price of all the tuna is ${total_without_coupons} + {num_coupons}*${coupon_value_dollars} =${full_price_all_tuna}.
He bought {num_cans} cans of tuna, so each can costs ${full_price_all_tuna} / {num_cans} = $<<{full_price_all_tuna}/{num_cans}={cost_per_can_dollars}>>{cost_per_can_dollars}
